title: 2010 Toyota Tundra (Not Running)

Note: Certificate of Title and Transfer Form will be mailed 1-2 weeks following the last day of removal. The Seller sells this truck "as-is" in non-running condition and with planned non-op registration; the Seller will not perform smog. The Buyer agrees to the responsibility to repair and pass smog. The Buyer agrees to purchase the vehicle "as-is" and agrees to repair and smog vehicle. An "as-is" no-smog bill of sale must be signed by both buyer/seller in an agreement to these stated terms. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of the inspections, transfer, repair and smog, registration, sales tax, and fees due to DMV.
